short_summary: Invitation to Tender - Wallace Harbour Basin Dredging
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid. Work of this Contract comprises of Class 'B' dredging located at the DFO-SCH Wallace Harbour Facility, Wallace, Cumberland County, NS.  Scope of Work under this contract includes but shall not be limited to the provisions of all labour, material and equipment necessary to complete the work in accordance with the plans, specifications and general conditions. The estimated value for this opportunity is within the following cost category:  $100,001.00 – $500,000.00 (HST Included).
full_summary:
=====================================

### Invitation to Tender: Wallace Harbour Basin Dredging

#### Reference Number
WS3795999230-Doc3859747890

#### Publication Date
February 6, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
February 21, 2023 at 2:00:00 PM (EST)

#### Procurement Category
Construction and Services: *Marine Construction Services (UNSPSC 72141200)*

### Supply Description

This Invitation to Tender is a follow-up to an Invitation to Qualify, and only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

The work under this contract is classified as *Class B* dredging at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Wallace Harbour Facility in Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia.

The scope of work includes providing all labor, materials, and equipment necessary to complete the work in accordance with the plans, specifications, and general conditions.

The estimated total value for this opportunity is within the range of $100,001 to $500,000 (inclusive of Harmonized Sales Tax [HST]).

### Evaluation Criteria

The winning bid will be selected based on the lowest price criterion.

### Requirements

The candidate must meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents and must comply with the specifications.

### Contact Information

For any questions or requests for clarification related to this tender, please contact:

* Timothee Beausoleil, Contracting Officer (Ministry of Public Services and Procurement Canada)
* Email: [timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is related to Nova Scotia, Canada.

### Regions of Delivery

This tender is related to Nova Scotia, Canada. The work will take place at the Wallace Harbour Facility in Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia.  Aly you you their help, merci!
